meanings.definition: A sugar alcohol used as a sweetener.
meanings.sent1: Lactitol is a sweetener in some sugar-free candies.
meanings.sent2: I added lactitol to my coffee instead of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The cookies were so sweet, they must have been made with lactitol!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a spoonful of lactitol.
meanings.sent5: The taste of lactitol lingered on his tongue like a sugary memory.

meanings.definition: A substance used to treat constipation.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed lactitol to help with constipation.
meanings.sent2: Lactitol is known for its gentle relief of constipation.
meanings.sent3: After taking lactitol, he felt as light as a feather!
meanings.sent4: The effect of lactitol was like a gentle breeze through the digestive system.
meanings.sent5: She felt the constipation melt away after taking lactitol.
